description: This file defines the MetricsHandlerDelegate class, a header-only component responsible for creating and sending various metrics and analytics events to an external analytics service via COM-RPC interface. It includes methods for user actions, app actions, page views, errors, and generalized badger metrics handling, with internal utilities for constructing event payloads, converting JSON variants, and interfacing with the IAnalytics service.

classes.name: MetricsHandler::MetricsHandlerDelegate
classes.description: A class responsible for constructing and dispatching various types of metrics and analytics events through an external interface, supporting different event types such as user actions, app actions, page views, and errors.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::MetricsHandlerDelegate
methods.description: Constructor initializing the delegate with a shell interface for communication.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::MetricsHandler
methods.description: Generic metrics handler for simple action events, optionally with appId forwarding.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::UserAction
methods.description: Dispatches a user action event, optionally with appId.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::AppAction
methods.description: Dispatches an app action event, optionally with appId.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::Error
methods.description: Dispatches a general app error event.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::HandleBadgerMetrics
methods.description: Main handler for incoming JSON parameters, routes to specific event methods based on 'segment' or 'eventType', flattens event data, and sends it via the analytics interface.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::SendViaAnalytics
methods.description: Internal method to send an event payload to the external analytics service using COM-RPC, with appId support.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::ValidateActionType
methods.description: Checks if an action string length is within valid range.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::ArgsToParametersObject
methods.description: Converts a vector of key-value pairs into a JSON object suitable for event payload.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::ReadString
methods.description: Utility to safely read a string value from JSON variant container by key.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::ReadBool
methods.description: Utility to safely read a boolean value from JSON variant container by key, with default.

methods.name: MetricsHandler::FlattenEvt
methods.description: Extracts nested 'evt' object from parameters and flattens it into key-value pairs.
